meanings.definition: Behaving or dressing in an excessively showy or effeminate way.
meanings.sent1: He wore a poncey hat with feathers to the party.
meanings.sent2: Her poncey outfit sparkled under the lights.
meanings.sent3: The poncey cat strutted around with a tiny bow tie.
meanings.sent4: The poncey flower stood out among the plain ones in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The poncey car had gold rims and a velvet interior.

meanings.definition: Showy or pretentious in an affected or excessive way.
meanings.sent1: The poncey mansion had marble statues in the garden.
meanings.sent2: She put on a poncey accent when talking to the guests.
meanings.sent3: The poncey peacock paraded around with a top hat.
meanings.sent4: His poncey behavior annoyed everyone at the event.
meanings.sent5: The poncey necklace was encrusted with fake gems.
